channel.title: Other People Can't Connect to My Server Source
channel.description:
I can log into the server and play, but other computers can't connect to my hosting computer.
It's not any fun anymore with no one to enjoy it?
So I took screenshots of the two things that need to be done to ensure people can connect to my source.
No-Ip Ready to be used: [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/MyNo-IP.jpg[/img]
Port Forwarded 43594: [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr196/sfts5/PortForwarded.jpg[/img]
Anything else I might have missed, please I need help with this anyone?

item.title: Other People Can't Connect to My Server Source
item.dc:creator: @power_on power_on
item.description:
@power_on wrote:

Thickertech:

try changing the custom service to dns

Okay I changed it to DNS like so:


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 04:50:11 am[/size][hr][quote=“vinku12, post:15, topic:260844”]i got same problem like half year so i just code servers and making website for servers lol but it will be good if ill get my server online too =P lol[/quote]

Yeah it sucks not being able to have others online with you.

Read full topic

item.title: Other People Can't Connect to My Server Source
item.dc:creator: @power_on power_on
item.description:
@power_on wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:12, topic:260844”]I know what is wrong.

You know the cmd,ipconfig. Sh!t

You entered 192.168.1.1
But do the ipconfig stuff and enter the
Ip adress that they say somthing like 192.168.1.105
Something like it[/quote]

Ah ok dude! I just changed it to 192.168.1.101 then

Read full topic
